metadata.title: CVE-2024-27351 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ``django.utils.text.Truncator.words()`` method (with ``html=True``) and``truncatewords_html`` template filter were subject to a potentialregular expression denial-of-service attack using a suitably crafted string(follow up to CVE-2019-14232 and CVE-2023-43665).

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
